lead_paragraph: A young man who had been taken in by the Catholic Church was surgically castrated decades ago after reporting sexual abuse, new evidence shows.

headline.print_headline: Dutch Church Is Accused Of Castrating Young Men
headline.main: Dutch Church Is Accused of Castrating Young Men
headline.seo: Dutch Church Accused of Castrating Up to 10 Young Men

abstract: Inquiry in the Netherlands finds that Henk Heithuis was castrated as a youth under the auspices of the Roman Catholic Church while under their care in the 1950s, after complaining about sexual abuse; it remains unclear whether Heithuis was maimed in retaliation for whistle-blowing or in an attempt to 'treat' his homosexuality; as many as nine other boys may have suffered the same fate during the period.
